title: Gold Ring
summaries: The Gold Ring is a Hardmode accessory that rarely drops from enemies exclusive to the Pirate Invasion, with the exception of Parrots. It has a 0.4*1/250 (0.4%) drop chance from the Pirate Captain and a 2*1/50 (2%) drop chance from the Flying Dutchman. Every other enemy has a 0.1*1/1000 (0.1%) chance to drop it.
Equipping the Gold Ring increases the player's coin pickup radius to 25 tiles, instead of the normal 3-tile radius. This item works similarly to the Celestial Magnet, Treasure Magnet and Heartreach.
